title: Borderless help
body:
Before the update I was fine with it but now I either have to sacrifice not being able to see my bottom HUD or not being able to see the left or right side of the mini map and being able to go left with unlocked screen. please help with fixing this
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your resolution is not set to fit your screen, so things are bleeding out a bit.  This is especially common on 4K which isn't currently supported  or resolutions exceeding 1920x1080.  Your best bet would be to reduce your resolution, and to also reset your config in case any modifications or corruption messed it up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

I hope that helps!
